abstract: Baijiu, an alcoholic drink that is China’s pride, has been largely off limits to foreign investors, but Diageo is offering $1.1 billion for a Baijiu producer.
snippet: Baijiu, an alcoholic drink that is China’s pride, has been largely off limits to foreign investors, but Diageo is offering $1.1 billion for a Baijiu producer.
lead_paragraph: Scotland has Scotch and China has white liquor. Baijiu, a clear drink that is 50 percent alcohol, is China’s national pride.

headline.main: Letting Diageo in Could Help Trade in China
headline.print_headline:
Letting Diageo In
Could Help China

byline.original: By WEI GU and ANTHONY CURRIE

abstract: Gap Inc. plans to open a flagship store in Shanghai on Thursday, and three other large outlets in Beijing and Shanghai this month.
snippet: Gap Inc. plans to open a flagship store in Shanghai on Thursday, and three other large outlets in Beijing and Shanghai this month.
lead_paragraph: SHANGHAI  With sales in the United States sluggish, one of America’s best-known apparel brands  Gap Inc.  is joining the rush to enter China’s fast-growing consumer market.

headline.main: Gap, Its U.S. Sales Tepid, Joins the Rush to China
headline.print_headline: Gap, With Tepid Sales at Home, Looks to the Emerging Consumer in China

keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas
